snippet: The president, in a series of executive actions, asked the patent office to take steps to block frivolous lawsuits filed by so-called patent trolls.
abstract: Obama administration is cracking down on so-called patent trolls, shell companies that exist merely for purpose of asserting they should be paid for holding patents that are being infringed by some software or electronic process; president announces several executive orders to protect innovators from frivolous litigation.
lead_paragraph: The president, in a series of executive actions, asked the patent office to take steps to block frivolous lawsuits filed by so-called patent trolls.

headline.seo: Obama Issues Orders to Stop ‘Patent Trolls’
headline.main: Obama Orders Regulators to Root Out ‘Patent Trolls’
headline.print_headline: Obama Orders Regulators to Root Out ‘Patent Trolls’
